name: Fell Orison - Rise of Kings
description:
A traveler referring to himself only as King awakens in a foreign land, fraught with peril. Travel forth and destroy those that stand in your way.

Meet survivors of  the land along the way and decide their fate. Recruit them for your adventure, cut them down to grow stronger or simply ignore their presence, the choice is yours. Just know that some actions have consequences.

  • Play as up to 6 characters in one run, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.
  • Cycle through special attacks specific to each character or unleash their unique power attack.
  • Multiple endings based on the actions you take.
  • Permanently unlockable game modes and upgrades for characters.
  • Shared-screen co-op on same system with a dedicated 7th character for player 2.
